issues.title: Missing Administrative Regulation for Implementation Procedures
issues.description: The Board Policy establishes the framework for confidentiality requirements but lacks corresponding Administrative Regulation detailing specific implementation procedures, training requirements, reporting mechanisms, and disciplinary processes. This creates a gap in operational guidance for staff and administrators.

legal_citations.text: Requires that employees receive "training or notice" regarding confidentiality requirements before disciplinary action can be taken for violations.

issues.required_language: Administrative Regulation should include: (1) Specific procedures for training employees on confidentiality requirements; (2) Process for documenting training completion; (3) Procedures for investigating alleged violations; (4) Progressive disciplinary measures; (5) Reporting and documentation requirements for inadvertent disclosures; (6) Process for determining what constitutes confidential information in various contexts.

issues.title: Missing Student Records Confidentiality Requirements
issues.description: The policy lacks specific provisions addressing confidentiality of student records and educational information, which are subject to strict federal and state privacy laws. This is a significant gap given that school employees regularly handle sensitive student information.

legal_citations.text: Prohibits disclosure of student records except as specifically authorized, and requires districts to establish policies protecting student privacy.

issues.required_language: Policy must address: (1) Prohibition on unauthorized disclosure of student records and educational information; (2) Reference to FERPA and state student privacy laws; (3) Consequences for violations of student privacy; (4) Requirements for staff training on student records confidentiality.

issues.title: Missing Personnel Records Confidentiality Provisions
issues.description: The policy does not specifically address confidentiality requirements for personnel records and employee information, which are subject to specific legal protections and disclosure limitations under California law.

legal_citations.text: Establishes specific confidentiality protections for personnel records and limits on disclosure of employee information.

issues.required_language: Policy should include: (1) Prohibition on unauthorized access to or disclosure of personnel records; (2) Limitations on sharing employee personal information; (3) Requirements for secure handling of personnel files; (4) Disciplinary consequences for violations of personnel records confidentiality.

issues.title: Outdated Policy Requires Review and Updates
issues.description: The policy was last updated in 2009 and may not reflect current legal requirements, technology considerations, or best practices for information security and confidentiality in the digital age.

legal_citations.text: Requires school boards to establish policies necessary for district operation and to keep policies current with legal requirements.

issues.required_language: Policy should be reviewed and updated to address: (1) Electronic information and cybersecurity considerations; (2) Social media and digital communication confidentiality; (3) Current legal citations and requirements; (4) Remote work and technology-related confidentiality issues.
